hero.title: Share information with tenants like you.
hero.body: We are a community-driven platform that aims to elevate tenant voices and promote landlord accountability.

icon.title: Help Keep Landlords Accountable
icon.anon-sub: Share your rental experience with confidence.
icon.sol-sub: Join fellow Tenants by creating an informed community.
icon.trans-sub: Empower others to make decisions about housing.
